headline: Duke Energy board appoints Jeffrey Guldner as board member
summary: Duke Energy's board of directors today announced the appointment of Jeffrey Guldner as a new board member, effective Sept. 15. Guldner has also been appointed to be a member of the Compensation and People Development Committee and Finance and Risk Management Committee.
